hero_title: Enhance your business with a professional website
hero_description: A creative studio that turns your ideas into custom digital solutions for small and medium-sized businesses.
services_description: These are our main services, click the card to learn more!

services.title: Professional Websites
services.description:
We create fast, responsive, and beautiful websites — designed to highlight your business from the first click.
Our priority is to deliver a light, functional, and tailored experience, whether to present your brand, attract clients, or increase sales.

services.title: Custom Web Applications
services.description:
Need more than a standard site? We build web systems designed specifically for your workflow.
Dashboards, internal tools, bookings, order control — whatever you need, we’ll code it.

services.title: Complete Visual Identity
services.description:
Your business needs a face, voice, and presence. We design logos, palettes, typography, and visuals that define your brand.
From business cards to social posts, your identity will shine with style and consistency.

services.title: Digital Presence & Content Management
services.description:
Your client is online. Is your brand? We help you position yourself on social media with strategy, visual identity, and relevant content.
We offer ready-to-use kits for stories, posts, covers, and more — all tailored to your brand.

services.title: Custom SAAS Solutions
services.description:
Need an online platform to serve clients, manage services, or offer something innovative?
We build custom SAAS systems: accessible from anywhere, with login, admin panel, and exclusive features.

services.title: On-Demand Solutions
services.description:
Got a specific idea or unique challenge? We love thinking outside the box.
We build personalized projects that mix design and tech to create unique solutions — with your style.

projects_description: We develop various projects that fit your goals.
about_paragraph_1: Codise was born in 2025 from friendship and the desire to create.
about_paragraph_2: We are three friends passionate about technology, design, and digital solutions that truly work. We merge the best of visuals and code to transform ideas into unique experiences — with custom websites, apps, and visual identities.
about_paragraph_3: We believe small businesses deserve an online presence as impactful as their potential.
about_mission_text: Our mission is to help small and medium businesses stand out online with creative, fast, and tailor-made solutions — with no complications.
about_motto_text: “We create what you imagine. And what you haven't even imagined yet.”
